<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Neophyte's Fipple](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2122)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 97 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 8 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You are untrained in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12).
</row>

</column>

---

Made of polished wood, a _neophyte's fipple_ is a block flute enchanted to guarantee melodic sound. When you Perform a song on the fipple to Activate it, your ability modifier, proficiency bonus, and item bonus for the Performance check total +7, regardless of what they would normally be. Add other bonuses and penalties to the check normally. Once the magic is used, the fipple remains as a mundane [instrument](/Equipment.aspx?ID=37).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
